name: Herbalist, Head Over Heels Demo
description: We've prepared a short story-only demo of our in-development title Herbalist, Head Over Heels for you! Please choose "Opening" when running the demo. This is a very early preview, and only includes two story scenes. Please note some features are still in development and may not be accessible at this time. Also note that the finalized title will have 18+ elements, but this demo is suitable for all ages.
